actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: Resolution relative to the impact of garment and textile imports upon employment in the garment industry of the United States.

summary.text: Directs the House Committee on Education and Labor to evaluate the impact of those garments and textiles produced in part or in whole in a facility outside of the United States, upon unemployment, in the garment industry in the United States, and upon unemployment generally in the United States.

titles.title: Resolution relative to the impact of garment and textile imports upon employment in the garment industry of the United States.
